characterList.description: A white man with dark brown short hair, wearing a green polo shirt.
characterList.name: Matt Holland

characterList.description: A white man with short brown hair and a beard wearing a black jacket with a fur-lined hood over a green turtleneck shirt. He is wearing a green and white Irish Football Fan TV lanyard around his neck. He is holding a black microphone in his right hand.
characterList.name: Reporter

content_metadata.description: A video featuring a post-match reaction to a match between Wales and Ireland, hosted by Matt Holland and a reporter.

qAndA.question: What was the final score of the match?

qAndA.answer: He watched the match at the stadium in Wales.
qAndA.question: Where did the reporter watch the match?

qAndA.answer: The reporter is disappointed with the Irish team's performance.
qAndA.question: What is the reporter's general feeling about the match?

qAndA.answer: No, the reporter feels that the current management needs to be replaced.
qAndA.question: Does the reporter support the current management of the Irish football team?

qAndA.answer: The reporter mentions Gareth Bale, Tom Lawrence and Joe Allen.
qAndA.question: What specific Welsh players does the reporter mention?

scenes.contextualRelevance: Introduction to Irish Football Fan TV.

narrativeProgression.description: Matt Holland introduces himself and the program, Irish Football Fan TV

scenes.thematicElements: Sports - The scene is an intro to a sports program about Irish football.
scenes.title: Introduction Scene

scenes.contextualRelevance: The reporter shares his post-match reaction, focusing on the Irish team's poor performance and management issues.

keyMoments.changeDescription: The scene becomes visually more dynamic as the reporter walks down a narrow street.

narrativeProgression.description: The reporter introduces his post-match reaction video after Wales defeated Ireland 4-1.
The reporter talks about the first goal.
The reporter laments the lack of ideas and identity from the Irish players.
The reporter talks about a fallout in the Irish team.
The reporter talks about how well Wales played and how poorly Ireland did.
The reporter expresses his discontent with the management of the Irish team.
The reporter talks about his expectation that the match would be an enjoyable occasion but was disappointed by the result.
The reporter encourages viewers to subscribe, like or dislike the video and leave a comment.

scenes.thematicElements: Sports - The scene is a post-match reaction video to a match between Wales and Ireland; Disappointment - The reporter is disappointed with the Irish team's performance and the management of the team.
scenes.title: Reporter Post-Match Reaction

climax.description: The reporter expresses his discontent with the management of the Irish team.

storylines.description: The video provides a post-match reaction to the Wales vs. Ireland match, detailing the reporter's disappointment with the Irish team's performance and highlighting key moments from the game.

content_metadata.title: Post-match Reaction Video

trimmingSuggestions.description: The section where the reporter repeats his views on the Irish team's lack of ideas.
The section where the reporter again criticizes the Irish team management.

youtube_description:
O'Neill & Keane Have To Go!! | Paul's Match Reaction | IWales 4-1 Ireland

After a horrible night in Cardiff, a frustrated Paul gives his reaction. Shaun Williams got a consolation as goals from Tom Lawrence, Gareth Bale, Aaron Ramsey and Connor Roberts wrapped up a deserved win for Ryan Giggs team

Twitter.com @irishfantv

Facebook & Instagram: @irishfootballfantv

Presenter: Paul Nealon
youtube_title: O'Neill & Keane Have To Go!! | Paul's Match Reaction | Wales 4-1 Ireland
